Params[3]: Soon, all the remains of the Hetero-Creatures are completely devoured by the monster in the container without leaving a trace of the Punishing Virus behind.
Roland juggles the container in his hand. The flesh inside does not look any different, even after devouring all the Hetero-Creatures.
Haha... Were they not enough for you?

The remaining Hetero-Creatures have stopped pursuing, their flight capabilities seemingly reaching their limits... but their behavior suggests that they are actually afraid of the more capable "monster" in Roland's hand.
Not only do they look like living organisms, but they're also even prioritizing survival, aren't they?
It is a creature's instinct to fear death and aim to survive. But the more humanity's rationality develops, the more humans can control their primal instincts.
That is why everyone's looking for a reason to live...
He once believed that life and death are just that. If there can be no definite answers, simply dying is enough to be a beautiful curtain call for him.
The ship begins to accelerate after disposing of the Hetero-Creatures. Roland looks up at the Moon in the distance.
Staying with the girl with white hair is his reason to live, or so he has presumptuously decided... As long as she chooses to keep going, he will do anything to help her without a second thought.
But if even she, as an agent, has lost her reasons to live...
Is Luna worth saving? That is the question Vonnegut has left him.
Roland takes out what Alpha gave him—a storage device as thin and light as a chip. It will crumple into dust with the gentlest force.

He had a brother too, but that yearning was man-made; not even his wits could tell if his feelings were genuine... Up until the last moment, he could not forget this "character" that only existed in the script.
Roland retracts his self-deprecating smile, sitting right there on the bow. In his left hand is the storage device from Alpha; in his right hand is the container with the stem cell from Vonnegut...
But no matter what we do, we are just side characters... Luna, only you can save yourself. Will it be death... or will it be life?
